subject: suggestions for a book to translate
msgSnippet: Hello, is anyone here?? I ve just written a small computer program to assist in TO-to-QS translation for text documents.  I wish to test it by translating a
messageBody:
Hello, is anyone here??

I've just written a small computer program to assist in TO-to-QS translation for text documents. I wish to test it by translating a book.

Does anyone have any suggestions for a book they would like translated? Good suggestions are a books that are out of copyright, popular and not too long (less than 400 pages).
